Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales ya que para ella es muy importante que sus clientes queden satisfechos con el servicio que reciben, ya que de esta forma logrará mantenerlos contentos y  quedarán con ganas de regresar a su negocio. Rosa quiere hacer crecer su negocio por lo que llego a la conclusión que la mejor forma es solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la comprar de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de pupusas como: frijoles, queso, arroz, maíz, chicharon, repollo, tomates, etc. además de hacer mejoras en las instalaciones de su negocio, con esto espera ampliar su clientela y de esta forma aumentar sus ganancias y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Emilia lives in her own house with her husband and son.  She makes and sells pupusas (stuffed tortillas).  She has been in this business for many years and has gained a lot of experience and loyal, daily customers who prefer her business to others.  She is a woman known for being enterprising, responsible and very hard-working.  She has very good personal references because customer satisfaction is top priority for her.

Rosa wants to expand her business and decided that the best way to do this was to request a loan from INTEGRAL.  She wants to use it to buy the ingredients she needs to make pupusas, such as beans, cheese, corn, pork cracklings, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.  She also wants to improve her business location so she can increase her customer base and earnings.  This will improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for "pupusas" (stuffed tortillas), such as bean, cheese, rice, corn, pork cracklings, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Maria Neri

texts.es: María Neri de 50 años, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de prendas de vestir como: blusas, faldas, vestidos, etc. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y de esta forma se ha ganado la vida ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es una mujer trabajadora, dedicada y emprendedora. Su objetivo principal es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el servicio que ofrece, ya que reconoce que de esto depende que pueda mantener sus ingresos y aportar a los gastos de su hogar. Es por esta razón que ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de telas, hilos, agujas, etc. para seguir ofreciendo productos bonitos y de excelente calidad. Dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para hacer la inversión, decidió solicitar a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar sus materiales para satisfacer la demanda de prendas de su creciente clientela.
texts.en:
María Neri, 50, lives in her own house with her husband and two children.  She makes and sells clothing, such as blouses, skirts, dresses, etc.  She has been a seamstress for many years and this has been her only source of income.  She is hard-working, dedicated, enterprising woman, whose main goal is customer satisfaction, since it is the basis for maintaining an income to cover household expenses.

That is why she has decided to buy a variety of fabrics, thread, needles, etc., to continue offering beautiful, high quality garments.  Since she does not have the necessary resources for the investment, she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy the materials she needs to fill the orders of her growing customer base.

loans.use: To buy a variety of fabrics, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es: María del Socorro se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, negocio que está ubicado en su casa de habitación, en la cual vive junto a sus hijos desde hace ya muchos años. María es una mujer emprendedora y cabeza de familia, lo que le hace trabajar duro para llevar el sustento diario para sus hijos. Ella cuenta con muchos años de experiencia, por lo que es muy buscada por su creciente y fiel clientela, la cual expresa ver en ella a una mujer trabajadora, honesta, honrada y con ganas de sacar a delante a su familia. Ella decidió solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de tortillas, como maíz, aceite, volteadores,  etc. y así siempre ofrecer a sus clientes productos de calidad. Ella confía en que con este crédito podrá incrementar sus ingresos lo cual le ayudara para darle a sus hijos educación y sustento.
texts.en:
María del Socorro makes and sells tortillas for a living.  Whe works out of her home where she has lived for many years with her children.  María is an enterprising woman and head of household, and works hard to provide daily support for her children.  She has many years of experience and a growing, loyal group of customers who see in her a hard-working, honest, honorable woman who wants to get ahead for her family.

She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to buy supplies, such as corn, oil, spatulas, etc., for her tortillas so she can continue offering her customers quality products.  She is confident the loan will increase her income so she can provide for her children and give them an education.

loans.use: To buy supplies, such as corn, oil, spatulas, etc., to make tortillas.

loans.name: Rosa Dina

texts.es: Rosa Dina vive en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar, ella se dedica desde ya hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de tamales de elote de manera ambulante en la zona que reside. Rosa por su gran experiencia en la elaboración de tamales cuenta con una gran y fiel clientela que siempre está a la espera de sus productos. Ella es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que tiene como sueño aportar en los ingresos de su familia para mejorar su calidad de vida ya que los de su esposo no alcanzan para satisfacer todas las necesidades de su hogar. Rosa necesita invertir en la compra de más materiales para la elaboración de tamales, como son: elotes, manteca, azúcar, etc. y así incrementar su productividad y por ende sus ingresos, es por eso que se acercó a una agencia de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito que le ayude a la compra de los materiales y estar así cada vez más cerca de cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Rosa Dina lives in her own house with her family and has been making and selling corn tamales in her neighborhood for several years.  She has a lot of experience making tamales and has a wide, loyal customer base always waiting for her products.  She is a very hard-working, enterprising woman whose goal is to provide for her family and improve their lifestyle, since her husband does not make enough to cover all the household expenses.

Rosa wants to buy more ingredients for her tamales, such as corn, lard, sugar, etc., to increase productivity and her income.  Therefore, she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy the supplies and get closer and closer to her goal.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as corn, lard, sugar, etc. to make tamales.

loans.name: Leonardo Guillermo

texts.es: Leonardo Guillermo se dedica a la elaboración de estructuras metálicas y vive junto a su hijo quien le ayuda en las labores diarias, Leonardo cuenta ya con aproximadamente treinta años de experiencia, lo cual lo hace muy solicitado por mucho clientes satisfechos con su excelente trabajo. Él se caracteriza por ser una persona honrada, honesta y trabajadora por lo que sus amigos, clientes y vecinos dan muy buenas referencias. Ya que esta es su única fuente de ingresos, ha decidido invertir en la compra de más equipo de trabajo como sierras, taladros, pulidoras y demás material que necesita para mejorar la calidad de sus trabajos, es por eso que decidió acercarse a una agencia de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito que le ayude a realizar esta mejora en sus herramientas y así poder seguir trabajando duro para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo. Espera recibir la ayuda y confia en Dios que la ayuda sera entregada.
texts.en:
Leonardo Guillermo makes metal structures and lives with his son, who helps out during the week.  Leonardo has been in business for 30 years and is in much demand by many customers who are very satisfied with his excellent work.  He is known for being an honest, hard-working person to his friends, customers and neighbors, who provide very good references for him.

Since this is his only source of income, he has decided to buy more work equipment such as saws, drills and polishers, as well as other material, to improve the quality of his work.  So, he decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to help improve his tools and continue working to give his son a better lifestyle.  He hopes he will receive this help and trusts in God that he will.

loans.use: To buy work equipment, such as saws, drills and polishers.

loans.name: Angela Melida

texts.es: Ángela de 41 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo e hijos. Ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en diferentes zonas donde ella es muy conocida por sus buenos productos, ella también realiza la venta en su casa de habitación ya que sus vecinos son parte de su frecuente clientela. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia  en el área.  Sus vecinos dan buenas referencias de su trabajo y de su persona ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y carismática. Para ella lo más importante es su familia  principalmente sus hijos los cuales son su principal inspiración para seguir luchando por darles una mejor calidad de vida. Ya cuenta con muchos clientes fieles es por ello que ha decidió invertir en la compra de más mercadería para mantener siempre bien surtido sus productos como Jeans, camisas y ropa para damas. Es por esta razón que se acercó a INTEGRAL con la idea de que este crédito le ayudara a realizar dicha inversión. Ella confía en Dios y en que esta nueva inversión le ayudara para seguir dando a sus hijos los estudios que les permitan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida en sus futuros
texts.en: Ángela is 41 years old and lives in a house of her own, together with her husband and children. She sells clothes from door to door in various areas where she is well-known for the quality of her products, and she also sometimes sells them at her house, since her neighbours are among her loyal customers. She has been in this line of work for many years and is thus very experienced. Her neighbours agree on her personal and professional qualities, stating that she is very hard-working, responsible, and charismatic. Ángela's life revolves around her family, especially her children, whom she cites as her main source of inspiration to keep fighting for every day: she wants, above all, to give them a better life. Ángela has many loyal customers already, which is why she chose to invest in her business by buying more clothes to sell, in order to always have products in stock, such as jeans, shirts, and women's clothing. Thus, she approached field partner INTEGRAL for a loan to make said investment. She trusts that God will help her take advantage of this opportunity to keep providing her children with an education that will enable them to have a better life in the future.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell, in order to always have products in stock.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María Magdalena de 45 años de edad, habita junto a sus nietos en su vivienda propia. Ella se dedica al comercio de ropa de manera ambulante en las principales áreas de la zona donde habita.  Ella es muy trabajadora y emprendedora. Desde hace algunos años decidió poner su negocio  de ropa, dado que sus ingresos le ayudan al cuidado y sustento de sus nietos y de su hogar. María se levanta muy temprano cada día para realizar todas las tareas del hogar, atender  a su familia y luego salir a buscar compradores para sus productos. Muchas personas la prefieren  ya que es una mujer muy amable y responsable, pero lo más importante es que los clientes siempre encuentran lo que buscan  a los mejores precios. Su sueño es poder incrementar su inventario de productos para incrementar sus ventas de tal forma que pueda incrementar sus ingresos y ayudar así a su familia. Es por estas razones que tomo la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para invertir en la compra de más prendas de vestir, como: faldas, blusas, camisetas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc. y de esta forma espera cumplir su sueño y confía en Dios así será. Vale la pena mencionar que ella expresa estar muy agradecida con esta institución, INTEGRAL, ya que recibirá la ayuda que necesita para salir adelante con su negocio.
texts.en: María Magdalena is 45 and lives in a house of her own, together with her grandchildren. She sells clothes from door to door in the main areas of the town where she lives. She is very hard-working and business-savvy. A few years ago, she decided to start selling clothes in order to take care of her grandchildren and pay for her household expenses. María wakes up very early every morning in order to do housework, take care of her family, and then go pander her wares. She has many loyal customers because she is a very nice and responsible lady, on top of always having the best wares at the best price. María's dream is to be able to offer a greater variety of products in order to improve her sales and her income, which would mean being able to do more for her family. This is why she decided to approach the field partner for a loan, which she will use to buy more articles of clothing, such as skirts, blouses, T-shirts, trousers, underwear, etc. She is confident that God will help her achieve her goals. She states that she is very thankful to field partner INTEGRAL for helping her financially with her business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Salvadora

texts.es: Salvadora de 54 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en su casa propia. Ambos se dedican a la elaboración y venta de tortas, hamburguesas y hot dog´s desde ya hace muchos años y es esta su única y principal fuente de ingresos. Salvadora es una mujer trabajadora, honrada y emprendedora, que se ha ganado la confianza de sus clientes por ofrecer productos de excelente calidad, es por eso que se acercó a una agencia de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito que le ayude en la inversión de más materiales para la elaboración de sus ricos productos, como son: pan, salchichas, carne, salsa, etc. y de esta manera siempre ofrecer a su fiel y creciente clientela productos de primerísima calidad, lo cual le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida. Espera contar con la ayuda ya que ella confia en Dios y al mismo tiempo espera saldar la deuda antes de lo previsto.
texts.en: Salvadora is 54 years old and lives in a house of her own, together with her husband. Both have been making and selling pies, hamburgers and hot dogs for many years, and this business is their only source of income. Salvadora is a hard-working, honest, and business-savvy lady, who won the loyalty of her customers thanks to the quality of her products. Building on her already existing customer base, she approached field partner INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in buying more ingredients to make her tasty products, such as bread, sausages, meat, sauce, etc. This way, she will be able to keep offering her customers, who are loyal and whose numbers are increasing, products of the highest quality, which will in turn increase her income and improve her life. Salvadora hopes for the help of Kiva lenders and trusts in God that she will be able to reimburse the loan earlier than expected.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients she needs.

loans.name: Furaha Group

texts.en:
Catherine is pictured on the right with her hand raised amongst her Furaha Group members. The 22 of them, 8 women and 14 men, are farmers in Lugari District. Catherine will grow maize and sorghum on a half acre of land using seeds and fertilizer delivered to her by One Acre Fund on credit. Catherine is a new One Acre Fund farmer and is excited about the 2013 rain season. She joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough food for her family and will use the increased profits to send her children to school.

Catherine described her harvest last year as good, but she hopes she can have an even better one as a One Acre Fund farmer. She plans to spend the money that she earns from her next harvest on sending her children to school and buying livestock. For the 2013 rain season, Catherine’s group members will each take loans for half an acre of land. In total, this group will receive loans for use on 11 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 70 years old and married with seven children. She works hard to provide for her family running a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase stock to sell in her general store like sugar, milk, coffee, spices and soap.

Virginia has borrowed and paid back 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her store for 12 years and also earns an income from buying and selling rice and from jeepney transport. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock to sell in her general store like sugar, milk, coffee, spices and soap.

loans.name: Hosana Group

texts.en:
Hosana is a group of 24 farmers in Lugari District represented by Mercy, who is on the right of the photo with her hand raised. The group has 19 women and 6 men. From her loan, Mercy will receive a half acre worth of seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum. The 2013 rain season will be Mercy’s first season with One Acre Fund. She joined this year in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer at the best prices and with reliable delivery.

Mercy described her harvest last year as good, but hopes she can have an even better one as a One Acre Fund farmer. She plans to spend the money that she earns from her next harvest on sending her children to school, saving for the future, engaging in poultry farming and buying livestock. For the 2013 rain season, Mercy’s group members will each take loans for half an acre of land. In total, this group will receive loans for use on 12 acres of land.   

The field officer is standing on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Armida

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Armida works hard to support her family. She has a business selling boneless dried fish in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing. She is borrowing 18,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to purchase more stocks of dried fish to sell.

Armida has been sustaining her business activities by using her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for cultivating maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer to cultivate maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer to cultivate maize and sorghum.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize and sorghum

loans.name: Amani

texts.en: Amani is a 21-year-old married lady. She is the mother of a baby daughter. Amani is also a university student. She took a break from college to give birth and now she is back at school where she is majoring in mental health. She has applied for this loan so she can pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Aladdin

texts.en: Aladdin is a 35-year-old married guy. He has only one daughter. Aladdin is a teacher and, at the same time, he owns a mini market for selling mostly food products. He has applied for this loan so he can increase the quantity of goods he has in the store and add some missing ones.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of goods he has in the store

loans.name: Majeda

texts.en:
Majeda is a 46-year-old conservative woman. She asked her son, Samer, to take her place in the photo.

Majeda is a public sector employee who is looking after her four-member family now that her husband is not working, due to his old age. Samer is a 22-year-old university student majoring in law. Majeda has applied for this loan to support her son in his education and pay the fees for his next semester.

loans.use: to pay the fees for her son's next semester at university

loans.name: Tecoporave Rekavo Group

texts.es:
Tecoporave Rekavo quiere decir en busca de una mejor manera de vivir, y es por eso que este grupo lleva ese nombre, ya que las 16 mujeres de este grupo desean crecer y salir adelante, gracias a su trabajo ya están en el séptimo ciclo.
Una de ellas es Irma, quien se dedica al reciclado de productos, como ser plásticos, cartones, aluminio y demás. Comenta que su trabajo le da los medios para poder salir adelante y ayudar a su familia. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que está orgullosa de lo que hace porque es un trabajo digno y honesto.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de aluminio, cartones y demás en cantidad, los cuales podrá revender y tener mayores ganancias.
Irma está contenta por la oportunidad que siempre recibe, pues la ayuda a crecer.
texts.en:
“Tecoporave Rekavo” is looking for a better life so the members chose this name for the group.  The 16 ladies want to grow and get ahead through their work.  They are in their seventh cycle.

Irma is one of them and she recycles plastic, cardboard, aluminum, and other things.  She says that her work gives her the means to get ahead and help her family.  She is a very hardworking person and proud of what she does because it’s honest and dignified work.

She is asking for this loan so that she can buy aluminum, cardboard, and other things in bulk.  She will be able to resell it and make a good profit.

Irma says that she is happy for this opportunity and that it will help her to grow.

loans.use: to buy recyclables.

loans.name: Salmi

texts.es:
La Sra. Salmi es una persona muy trabajadora, y gracias al anterior crédito que retiro gracias a Kiva y de fundación pudo mejorar su casa y también tener mayor variedad de productos que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
Actualmente también se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos, con lo cual esta mejorando mucho sus ingresos y puede seguir ayudando a su familia.
Solicita nuevamente esta ayuda para la compra de 3 chanchos para poder engordar y así seguir trabajando. Ella esta agradecida por la ayuda que ha recibido.
texts.en:
Salmi is a very hardworking person.  She was able to make improvements to her home and have a large number of products to offer her customers, thanks to the previous Kiva loan and that of the foundation.

She raises and sells pigs and is increasing her income greatly, allowing her to continue helping her family.

She is asking for another loan so that she can buy three pigs to raise.  This will allow her to continue working.  She is grateful for the help she has received.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Las emprendedoras están en su cuarto ciclo, son mujeres jefas de familia que se dedican cada una a profesiones sacrificadas y con ello ayudan a sus familias.
Una de ellas es Blanca, quien también es la presidenta de este grupo, ella se dedica a la costura, es muy buena en su trabajo y es gracias a ello que está saliendo adelante, se hace de muy buena clientela que siempre le trae muchos trabajos. Su meta es poder tener un gran taller y también dar trabajo a otras personas. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de telas e hilos, y así seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The entrepreneurs are in their fourth cycle. The women are heads of the family and each of them make professional sacrifices in order to support their families.

Blanca is one of them. She is also president of this group. She works as a seamstress. She is very good at her job and it is thanks to it that she is getting ahead. She has a good customer base always bringing her work. Her goals are to be able to have a larger workshop and also to provide work for others. She is asking for a loan in order to buy fabric and thread so that she can continue working and fulfilling customer orders.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread so that she can continue working and fulfilling customer orders in her work as a seamstress.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to cultivate maize and sorghum

loans.name: Fatma

texts.en:
Fatma is 30 years old and from the Negev. She works as a kindergarten teacher’s assistant in the mornings and runs her bridal salon in the afternoons and on weekends.

Fatma is a dedicated, organized business woman. She completed a microenterprise development and management course at her local small business association and is putting her previous training in hair styling and makeup to good use. 

Fatma opened a bridal salon in her home. She is known for her unique and classic taste and professionalism. She provides bridal dresses for rent and does hair styles, makeup, and seamstress services. Fatma needs to upgrade her salon, purchase new dress styles, and expand her services.

Fatma will use this loan to buy bridal dresses to rent, as well as makeup supplies, chairs, mirrors, and an air-conditioning unit for her salon.

Fatma wants one day to move her bridal salon into the center of town and further expand her services.

loans.use: To buy bridal dresses for rent, as well as makeup supplies, chairs, mirrors, and an air conditioning unit for her salon

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 41-year-old conservative woman. She asked her husband to appear in the photo instead.

Asmaa is a mother of three girls and a son. To help her husband support the family, they established a mini-market, where she sells food and cleaning supplies. 

Asmaa has applied for this loan because there are a lot of missing products that she wishes to bring into the store.

loans.use: To bring missing products into the store

loans.name: Samah

texts.en:
Samah is 24 years old, married and the mother of two boys. While her husband is serving in the military, Samah is selling accessories, perfumes and other goods in her general store. 

She has applied for this youth loan to increase the quantity of accessories to turn her store into an accessories and perfumes shop.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of accessories in her store

loans.name: Sabrin

texts.en:
Sabrin is a 25-year-old conservative woman. She asked her mother to take her place in the photo.

Sabrin is married and has a son and a daughter. Her husband owns a mini-market, through which he supports the family. Sabrin has applied for this youth loan to help her husband bring more products into the store.

loans.use: to help her husband bring more products into his store

loans.name: Trifilo

texts.es:
El señor es Trifilo es de la ciudad de Pilar, tiene un centro de ventas y reparaciones de productos electrónicos. El se define a si mismo como una persona muy trabajadora que desea salir adelante por su propio trabajo.
Comenta el Sr. Trifilo que por medio de su trabajo ha podido ir creciendo y agrandando su negocio lentamente, ya tiene muy buena clientela, ya que siempre da un buen servicio a sus clientes.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos y repuestos para poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes y también seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Trifilo is from the city of Pilar.  He has an electronics store and repair shop.  He describes himself as a very hardworking person who wants to get ahead with his own job.

Trifilo says that with his job he has been able to slowly continue to expand his business.  He already has very good customers because he always gives them good service.

He's requesting this loan to buy supplies and parts to be able to continue to serve his customers well and also to continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy supplies and parts

loans.name: Getrude

texts.en:
Getrude has carried out this business for close to eight years now. She applied for a first loan, and though there were some challenges, she believes she has learned valuable lessons to improve on. 

She now intends to increase her sources of income by setting up a charcoal selling point. She is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenyan shillings to purchase extra clothes and sacks of charcoal.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of secondhand clothes and charcoal.

loans.name: Burmakan

texts.ru:
Бурмакан родилась в г. Жалал-Абад (Жалал-Абадской области), ей 45 лет, семейное положение замужем,  проживает со своей семьей в г. Жалал-Абад. Заемщица после окончания средней школы в г. Жалал-Абад вышла замуж. Мать одного ребенка. Вместе с мужем начали разводить крупнорогатый скот.
Заемщица в настоящее время   занимается  животноводством, в этой сфере занимается с 1998 года. Бизнес начинала с 5 000 сомов. Постепенно развиваясь и увеличивая оборотные средства построила дом.В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бурмакан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) На всю сумму полученного кредита планирует купить  скот для разведения и реализации.
Заемщица планирует в будущем создать большую ферму для разведения КРС. После получения прибыли от данной деятельности заемщица планирует перестроить дом . 
За период подготовки необходимых документов и проведения финансового анализа заемщица  показала себя с положительной стороны, как человек ответственный,  порядочный, добросовестный, предприимчивый, умеющий правильно вести хозяйство и вкладывать денежные средства в нужное направление.
texts.en:
Burmakan is a 45-year-old married woman. She was born in the city of Jalal-Abad, where she continues to live with her family. She got married after completing high school and is now the mother of one child. 

Together with her husband, the Burmakan began raising cattle. She has been working in animal husbandry since 1998, when she started her business with 5,000 som. By gradually developing her business and increasing her working capital, she was able to build a home. 

With long-term business development in mind, Burmakan turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 30,000 som. She plans to use the loan to purchase cattle to raise and resell. In the long-term, the borrower would like to start a large cattle farm. She plans to use the profit from this loan to rebuild her home. While preparing the necessary documents and financial analysis, the borrower proved herself to be a responsible, well-organized, conscientious, enterprising person capable of properly running her farm and investing her money in the right places.

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru: Нурали живет в городе Истаравшан. Ему 41 года. У него 5 детей. Нурали занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота. В работе ему помогают его дети. Он хочет увеличить поголовье своего скота и собирается покупать крупнорогатый скот.
texts.en: Nurali lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 41 years old and has 5 children.  He raises cattle. His children help him with his work.  He wants to increase his livestock headcount and is planning to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Abdulmurod

texts.ru: Абдулмурод живет в городе Истаравшане. Ему 40 лет. Он женат, у него 3 детей. Он 4 года занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота. В работе ему помогает его жена. Абдулмурод собирается взять кредит для покупки крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdulmurod lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 40 years old and has three children.  He has been involved in raising cattle for four years.  His wife helps him with his work.  He is planning to take a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy basic grains, instant food, soft drinks, bars of soap, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Turgunbu

texts.ru:
Тургунбу родилась в г. Жалал-Абад, ей 44 года, семейное положение замужем,  проживает со своей семьей. Заемщица после окончания средней школы в г. Жалал-Абад вышла замуж. Мать троих детей. Вместе с мужем начали разводить крупно рогатый скот.
Заемщица в настоящее время   занимается  животноводством, в этой сфере занимается с 1996 года. Бизнес начинала с 8 000 сомов. Постепенно развиваясь и увеличивая оборотные средства, увеличила количество голов скота, построила дом.В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Тургунбу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) На всю сумму полученного кредита планирует купить 3 коровы для разведения и реализации.
Заемщица планирует в будущем создать большую ферму для разведения КРС и МРС. После получения прибыли от данной деятельности заемщица планирует женить сына, купить автотранспорт. 
За период подготовки необходимых документов и проведения финансового анализа заемщица  показала себя с положительной стороны, как человек ответственный,  порядочный, добросовестный, предприимчивый, умеющий правильно вести хозяйство и вкладывать денежные средства в нужное направление. У заемщицы имеется сарай и все необходимые условия для выпаса и содержания скота.
texts.en:
Turgunbu was born in the city of Jalal-Abad.  She is 44 years old, married, and she lives with her family.  She attended high school in her native town and then got married.  She is now the mother of three children. 

Turgunbu and her husband got involved in raising cattle.  Our borrower has been involved in animal husbandry since 1996, starting in this business with an initial capital of 8,000 som.  Gradually developing and increasing her working capital,  she has also increased her cattle headcount and built a house.  Eager to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  She will use the whole amount of the loan to buy three cows that she will raise and resell.

Turgunbu's future plans include the creation of a large farm to raise cattle and other small livestock.  With the profits received from this activity, she is planning to marry her son and buy a truck.

During the period when all necessary documents were prepared for this loan and a financial analysis was performed, our borrower gave a very positive image.  She appeared as a responsible, honest, conscientious and enterprising woman who knows how to properly run her business and invest her money wisely.  The borrower owns a barn and can provide all the necessary conditions for cattle grazing and management.

loans.use: to buy three cows.

loans.name: Corina Guadalupe

texts.es: Corina Guadalupe de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia;  cliente posee un Chalet de golosinas, panes, bebidas entre otros en un centro escolar ubicado cerca de su hogar, ya tiene mucho tiempo de trabajo que le ha regalado  experiencia en las ventas y eso le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues los estudiantes la prefieren porque comercia  productos de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio;  Corina es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, tiene muchos sueños que desea alcanzar y esta dispuesta trabajar duro para lograrlo, pues sabe que solo así obtendrá el éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar su negocio pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar golosinas por mayor, bebidas, panes, galletes etc. Corina Guadalupe tiene buenas referencias de pago y muy buena moral asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y al mismo tiempo tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Corina Guadalupe is 46 years old and lives with her husband and children in a home of her own.  She has a stand where she sells snacks, bread, drinks, and other things in a school zone located near her home.  She has been working on this for some time and has much experience in sales.  This has allowed her to have better earnings and she has many steady customers because the students prefer to buy from her since she offers good products, at good prices, and provides excellent service above all.  Corina is an enterprising woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She has many dreams that she wants to reach and is prepared to work hard to achieve.  She knows that this is the only way to succeed.

As with every good merchant, she wants to grow her business but she needs working capital, so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL.  This will allow her to buy snacks, drinks, bread, cookies, etc. in quantity.  Corina Guadaupe has a good payment history and is of good moral character.  She assures us that she will be able to repay the loan and believes that she will be able to give her family a good life.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Davaasuren

texts.en:
Davaasuren, 30 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a rental apartment. She has been running a pay toilet business at a bus station for four years. Her eldest son, 9 years old, goes to secondary school and the other one stays at home.

Her husband has been running a taxi service for five years. The automobile which is used for the taxi service has become obsolete and needs updating. So she is requesting a loan of 3,500,000 MNT to buy a new automobile. As a result, it will enable the family to generate more income, and she has the goal of building their own house in the future.

loans.use: to buy a new automobile for her husband's taxi service.

loans.name: Silvia Yaneth

texts.es: Silvia Yaneth de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa familiar; ella se dedica a la compra y venta de productos por catálogo, como cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su hogar y en forma ambulante se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que venden es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Silvia Yaneth es una mujer  activa, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora todos los días se esfuerza por trata de cumplir sus sueños sabe que solo con constancia y amor al trabajo podrá alcanzar ese éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cremas, perfumes, cosméticos etc. Silvia Yaneth tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Silvia Yaneth, 29 years old, lives together with her children in the family home.  She makes a living buying and selling products by catalog such as creams, perfumes and cosmetics, among other things.  She has several years with the business and that has given her a lot of experience that allows her to obtain the best profits.  She sells from her home and as a street vendor.  She has built a large clientele as people prefer her because everything that she sells is of top quality and at accessible prices in addition to the unbeatable service always to the order of her customers.  

Silvia Yaneth is an active woman, dedicated to her work and very determined.  Every day she does her best to try to fulfill her dreams.  She knows that only with perseverance and love of work can she reach that success.  

In the recent weeks demand for the product has risen and she wants to recover.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to purchase creams, perfumes, cosmetics, etc.  Silvia Yaneth has good payment references and is very responsible.  She assures that she can pay off the debt and at the same time she has faith that she will give her family a better life.

loans.use: to purchase creams, perfumes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina Isabel de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida sus hijos en casa propia; ella posee una venta de panes con pollo, tiene varios años con el negocio y ya posee amplia experiencia en la cocina lo cual le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su vivienda la cual esta ubicada en una zona muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija que la prefiere porque sus panes son los mas exquisitos, elaborados con materia prima de calidad e higiene, con precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Reina es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor siempre esta buscando alternativas que le den la oportunidad de encontrar el mejor camino al éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo, quiere realizar una nueva inversión para poder aumentar su producción pero para ello necesita de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollos, panes, aderezos, verduras, etc. Reina Isabel tiene buenas referencias de pago y se siente satisfecha con la ayuda, se hace totalmente responsable de cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Reina Isabel is thirty-two years old and lives with her life partner and children in their own home. She has a business where she sells chicken sandwiches; she has a few years of experience with her business and has a lot in cooking which helps her increase her earnings. The business is located in her home which is located in a transited area, she has a steady customer base that prefer her items because her bread is very delicious and made with high quality raw materials and hygienic standards with accessible prices but above all, excellent service. Reina is a very enterprising woman, dedicated to her job and is always looking for alternatives to give her better ways to be successful and is determined not to give up until she fulfills her goal. The new investment will be used to increase her production but in order to do that she needs capital and went to INTEGRAL for a loan that will help her buy chickens, bread, seasonings, vegetables, etc. Reina Isabel has good payment references and is grateful for the help; she is completely responsible of paying of all of her debt and has faith that she will bring financial stability to her home.

loans.use: buy chickens, bread, seasonings, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Gerelsuren

texts.en:
Gerelsuren, 26 years old, lives with her husband and six year old child in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. Since 2010, she has been working in a train station and her husband works for National Emergency Agency of Mongolia. Their son goes to secondary school.

The family has begun to build their own house, completed in 2012. But it is missing the furniture that will make the house a comfortable living space, so she is requesting the loan of 3,000,000 MNT to buy them. A comfortable and good, quality house will certainly make their life better and in return she and her husband will work enthusiastically and invest in their son’s education without worry.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Nelson Armando

texts.es: Nelson Armando vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, el posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad granos basicos, leche, pan, jabon entre otros, esta ubicado en su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, tiene varios años con su pequeño negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite alcanzar muy buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela  las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Nelson es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, siempre esta buscando alternativas que le den un futuro mas prospero, por lo que día a día se esfuerza al máximo para alcanzar su objetivo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos basicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, etc. Nelson Armando tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Nelson Armando lives with his life companion and their children in their own house. He has a store where he sells basic products such as basic foodstuffs, milk, bread, and soap, among other items. The store is located in his home in a busy area. He has had his little business for a number of years, and this has given him a lot of experience in sales, which allows him to achieve very good earnings and has given him a lot of customers. People prefer him because everything that he sells is of first quality, at affordable prices, and above all with excellent service. Nelson is an entrepreneurial man, dedicated to his work. He is always looking for options that will give him a more prosperous future. For this reasons he strives to the maximum day after day to reach his goal. In recent weeks demand has increased, and he wants to make a new investment but he doesn't have sufficient capital. For this reason he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy basic foodstuffs, instant products, candies, bread, beverages, etc. Nelson Armando has good payment references and is very responsible. He confirms that he will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time he has faith that he will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic foods, instant products, sweets, bread, and beverages

loans.name: Batnyam

texts.en: Mr. Batnyam, 31 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been working as a contract distributor in a bread-selling, state-owned company. His wife has a bookkeeping job in a private high school and recently took her maternity leave. The family purchased a plot of land where he built his house in 2008. As the winter comes to Mongolia, he is in need of repairing his home. So, he is requesting a loan of 5,000,000 MNT to buy a low-pressure cooker, a vacuum-sealed window, and some construction materials that are required for some interior repairs. The vacuum-sealed window and interior repairs shall reduce the home's heat loss, and they will also provide a comfortable living environment. In addition, the low-pressure cooker, especially during the winter, will reduce their consumption of coal drastically. As a result, the family will live in comfort and also contribute to protecting the environment.

loans.use: To buy a low-pressure cooker and a vacuum-sealed window

loans.name: Munkhtur

texts.en:
Mr. Munkhtur, 40 years old, lives with his wife and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His elder two children study at a local secondary school and other one goes to kindergarten. They reside in their own house. He has been working as a distributor in a private food selling company where his wife has a contract and sells its products. 

They are using a very old automobile and want to change it with new one. So, he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy a new car. The old automobile has burdens such as it constantly stops working out of the blue, requires repair in high frequency, and uses a lot of fuel. They want to buy new automobile which will emit less smoke and have positive impact on the environment.

loans.use: to buy an automobile.

loans.name: Darkhanbaatar

texts.en: Darkhanbaatar, 25 years old, lives with his younger sister in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi service to local people for the last two years. Before running this taxi service, he was a student at university but left it due to family reasons. His sister, 21 years old, is a senior student at university, and next year is her graduation year. Darkhanbaatar worked tirelessly for the last two years and as a result has purchased a new apartment. He is thinking of repairing the kitchen of his new apartment, so he is requesting the loan of 2,000,000 MNT. By repairing their kitchen, the hard working siblings can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to repair his kitchen.

loans.name: Arnel

texts.en:
This is Arnel, 30, a resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. He is married to Nancy, a Medical Technician and a mother to his child. He, together with his wife, manages their own household while operating the business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide an income for their everyday expenses.

Arnel maintains a tricycle business. He owns and drives one tricycle (motorcycle with sidecar) that carries up to four passengers to their destination within the community. He starts working early in the morning until late in the evening. There are times when he drives from late evening until wee hours in order to have a bigger profit. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of 300 PHP in his transportation business every day.

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting an amount of 12,000 PHP for his loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy motorcycle parts for the maintenance of his tricycle unit. He has to maintain his unit in good condition in order to have a regular income for the daily needs of his family. 

Arnel hopes to have a good life and dreams of expanding his business. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week, where he also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the spare parts and maintenance of his tricycle unit.

loans.name: Marga Indah Ternak Group

texts.en:
With the same members, the Marga Indah Ternak group is requesting a new loan. To increase the business, the group is asking for higher loan amount. Now, they will receive 15,000,000 IDR as a group (each receives 1.5 million IDR). The loan will be used to purchase piglets and feed, and to renovate the cage.

Ni Komang will use her loan to purchase feed and to renovate the cage. Now she has two sows and she hopes that they can give birth again. To prepare for it, she buys good quality feed and wants to widen the cage. She hopes the plan will run well and she can be a piglet seller in her village.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed, and to renovate the pig cage.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy parts and accessories for mobile phones

loans.name: Macaria

texts.es: Macaria de cincuenta y tres años de edad vive junto a sus hijos; ella posee una venta de ropa  para damas, caballeros y especialmente para niños, además comercia calcetas de toda talla para complementar los gastos del hogar, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas y eso le ayuda a obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde su vivienda y de forma ambulante, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el excelente servicio; Macaria es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan estar un paso mas cerca del éxito y no se rendirá hasta lograrlo por completo; en las ultimas semanas  aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y calcetas. Macaria tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable esta contenta con el apoyo, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Macaria, 53, lives with her children.  She sells clothing for women, men, and especially children.  She also sells socks of all sizes to pay for the household expenses.  She has a lot of experience in sales, which helps her get the best profits.  She sells from her home and on foot.  She has a lot of customers who prefer her for the quality of her products, the good prices, and above all for her excellent service.

Macaria's an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her job and wants to get ahead.  She's always hoping for new opportunities that will allow her to be one step closer to success, and she won't give up until she achieves it.

Demand has gone up in the last few weeks and she wants to take advantage of it to make a new investment, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy clothing wholesale and socks.

Macaria has a good payment record and impeccable morals.  She's happy about the support.  She's certain she'll be able to pay pay the loan and also trusts she'll give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale and socks

loans.name: Sabelita

texts.en:
This is Sabelita. She previously accessed a 14,000 PHP loan that she used to buy school supplies to expand her product inventory. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another loan of 22,000 PHP to buy more stocks of school supplies. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and with the educational expenses of her child. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Sabelita dreams of being able to give all her children a good and high quality education and hopes to expand her business through her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share her work stories every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stocks of school supplies needed in her business.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
This is Nelly. She previously accessed a 13,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread, and other materials needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another loan of 15,000 PHP to buy additional supplies of raw materials like fabric and thread. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and with her children’s education. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Nelly hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams of being able to give her family a good future and to send her children to college through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, where she also draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw materials like fabrics, thread, and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Genie

texts.en:
Genie is a business-oriented mother. She sells reading books, such as encyclopedias and magazines, to the students in their village. She has the determination to succeed, which is why she opened up another business of selling food products, such as pastries. She offers her products to nearby stores and homeowners at Cataggaman. From her businesses, she acquires about 40,000 PHP. She saves her income for the family's daily consumption, such as for meals, electric bills, and revolving capital for her businesses.

Now, Genie is asking for a loan of 50,000 PHP to invest in expanding her food selling business. She will buy more boxes of hopia (mung bean pastry) to sell. She also hopes to keep extending friendly services to all her costumers. 

In the future, Genie would like to keep generating good income from her businesses, achieve income stability, and become a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy more hopia (mung bean pastry) to sell.

loans.name: Tumenjargal

texts.en:
Mrs. Tumenjargal, 36 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She and her husband rent an autobus from a private company and the family income comes from autobus transportation. As a means of sparing some money, the family resides within company territory where other employees also live and work. Their elder son goes to secondary school and other one stays at home. 

The autobus has been damaged over the years of its usage and it needs some equipment changed and updated. So, she is requesting a loan of 4100000 MNT to buy some necessary equipment. After repairing and updating their autobus, the family can work enthusiastically and improve their living standard.

loans.use: to buy equipment to repair her autobus.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
This is Marina. She previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts and accessories for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. Her earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another loan, this time for 25,000 PHP, to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Marina dreams of having her house renovated and hopes to expand her business through her hard work in her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and maintenance of their tricycle unit.

loans.name: Glenda Yanira

texts.es: Glenda Yanira de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; Glenda es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa, cosméticos etc. Glenda Yanira tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Glenda Yanira is 33 years old and lives with her partner and children in her own house. She makes a living by selling clothes and cosmetics. She has had the business for several years; this has given her a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain better profits. The business is located in her home and is very well-known to the people in the area. She has built up a strong clientele because the people know that everything is of good quality, at reasonable prices and with an unequalled service that is always to the order and taste of the customers. Glenda is an enterprising woman. She is dedicated to her work and is very tenacious. Day by day she does her utmost to obtain a better life for herself and great success for the future. 

Demand has increased in recent weeks and she wants to take the opportunity to invest more into the business, but she does not possess the necessary capital for backing. For this reason, she is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan, which will allow her to buy clothes, cosmetics, etc. Glenda Yanira has unimpeachable morals and good references to vouch for her payment history. She says that she will be able to pay off the debt and hopes that the loan will bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Munkhragchaa

texts.en:
Munkhragchaa, 30 years old, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running a taxi service for six years and his wife works as a technologist in a state-owned bread-selling company.

As winter arrives in Mongolia, the couple is in urgent need of insulation for their home. So he is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to buy insulating materials. An insulated home will reduce heat loss so the family will burn less coal and in return it will contribute to environmental protection.

loans.use: to buy materials to insulate his home.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
This is Elsa. She previously accessed a 10,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another loan, this time for 12,000 PHP, to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Elsa hopes to grow her business and dreams of having a good life through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Enkhtuya

texts.en: Enkhtuya, age 50, lives with her family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been producing felts for gers (Mongolian traditional homes) for the last six years. As winter comes to Mongolia, many households are in need of felts and felt demand is increasing due to its insulating property. But because of a lack of finance, she can’t afford the process of felt making. So she is requesting a loan of 6,800,000 MNT to buy some equipment and machines. As a result, the people who need to insulate their gers will be able to buy felts, and Enkhtuya will be able to generate more income for her family. Most importantly, it will contribute greatly to environmental protection as insulated homes burn less coal as a source of heat.

loans.use: to buy equipment and machines

loans.name: Batdelger

texts.en: Batdelger, age 51, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been providing taxi services since 2010, and recently purchased plot of land where he built his own house. But due to a lack of finances, some of the construction work is incomplete, and as winter comes to Mongolia, he urgently needs to insulate and finish the remaining work. So Batdelger is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy insulating and construction materials. The finished house will ensure the well-being of his family members and, most importantly, will prevent heat loss and reduce the consumption of coal as a heat source. This action will certainly contribute greatly to environmental protection efforts.

loans.use: to buy insulating and construction materials

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
This is Merlinda. She previously accessed an 18,000 PHP loan which she used to purchase a greater quantity and variety of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed for her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy more groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better – more items to sell will result in better profits. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to meet her daily needs. Merlinda looks forward to this financial improvement with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. She hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of having a good life. She meets up faithfully with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: to buy more groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products

loans.name: Jessamin

texts.en:
This is Jessamin. He previously accessed a 40,000 PHP loan that he utilized to buy gardening materials and supplies needed for his business. His earnings were a big help to their personal, household and business expenditures. 

He would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy gardening materials like wire, baskets and supplies such as seeds and fertilizer needed for his business. The profits from his business will definitely help him sustain their daily needs. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. 

Jessamin dreams to have a good life and hopes that his house will be finished. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and farm supplies needed for his business.

loans.name: Jacoba Anita

texts.es: Jacoba Anita vive junto a su madre, sus hijos y sus nietos en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, pan, huevos, leche, jabón, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le ha permitido obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda esta ubicada en su residencia en una colonia muy transitada de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela pero sus mejores clientes fijos son sus vecinos, todos la prefieren porque posee la tienda mas surtida, con productos de calidad, y a precios accesibles, además de un excelente servicio; Jacoba es una mujer enérgica, decidida, humilde y muy dedicada a su labor, siempre esta luchando por ganarse un futuro mejor, su mas grande secreto es el amor a su trabajo sabe que solo así y con esfuerzo podrá lograr el éxito que tanto desea,  como toda buena comerciante desea acrecentar el negocio pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, pan, golosinas, bebidas, producto instantáneo, etc. Jacoba Anita tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jacoba Anita lives together with her mother, her children and her grandchildren in her own house.  She has a store where she sells items to fulfill basic needs like staple grains, bread, eggs, milk, and soap, among others.  She has done this for several years and has a lot of valuable experience that has allowed her to make better earnings.  The store is located in her house in a very well travelled neighborhood.  She already has a lot of customers, but her best regular customers are her neighbors.  The all prefer her because she has the best stocked store with quality products at accessible prices, in addition to excellent service.

Jacoba is an energetic woman, decisive, humble and very dedicated to her work.  She is always struggling to achieve a better future.  Her biggest secret is her love of her work.  She knows that only in this way and with great effort will she be able to achieve the success that she wants so much.  Like all good businesspeople, she wants to grow her business, but she doesn't have sufficient capital.  Because of this she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy staples grains, bread, candies, drinks, instant products, etc.  Jacoba Anita has good payment references and an irreproachable character.  She promises that she will be able to pay her debt and at the same time she is confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, bread, candy, drinks, and instant products

loans.name: Petra

texts.en: Petra is a retail store owner who has been patiently operating her store for over 15 years, and usually earns PHP 15,000 each month. She is taking a loan of  PHP 50,000 as additional capital to keep expanding her product line. She will buy sacks of rice which will add to her merchandise. She will also buy canned goods, cases of soft drinks, and biscuits to sell. She hopes to keep offering good services to her costumers, and likewise good products too. With continuous efforts, patience and hard work, Petra will become successful in her business and will gain financial security for her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, canned goods, cases of soft drinks, and biscuits

loans.name: Justus

texts.en:
Justus, 43, is working at a local agency. He is married and has two children who are both attending school. To support them with an additional income, Justus started a kiosk business at his house 13 years ago. He sells basic daily requirements i.e. sugar, oil, coffee, tea, instant noodles, etc. The availability of those things resulted in many customers shopping at his kiosk often. 

Currently, Justus finds that his customers request several things that are not available at his kiosk. In order to meet the customers' demands, Justus is requesting loan assistance from TLM amounting to 5,000,000 IDR, to be spent on rice in bulk, mobile phone recharges and also more kiosk products i.e. oil, soap, instant noodles, etc. The remainder of the loan will also help him to pay for his children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy rice in bulk, mobile phone recharges and more kiosk products i.e. oil, soap, instant noodles, etc.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Con su anterior credikiva, Miriam hizo muchas cosas: como comprar sillas, mesas y una lista larga de insumos al por mayor, como arroz, aceite granos y pastas, que le permitieron ganar descuentos especiales. Ella envía un mensaje de agradecimiento a los finaciadores de Kiva, pues dice "le permiten al pequeño empresario fortalecer su negocio" por eso solicita seguir contando con ellos.  En la actualidad se acercan las fiestas de fin de año y con ellas el aumento de sus ventas, por eso requiere tener inventarios de víveres, para elaborar pasteles o amasijos de arroz, verduras, tres carnes sometido a cocción una vez envueltos en hojas de bijao, que es el producto mas significativo en estas celebraciones y el que le genera una mayor utilidad, lo cual hace de su credikiva una inversión nuevamente exitosa.
texts.en:
With her previous Kiva loan, Miriam did many things, such as buying chairs, tables and a long list of wholesale ingredients such as rice, oils, grains and pastas, that allowed her to get special discounts.  She sends a message of thanks to the Kiva lenders, and says "they allow the small entrepreneur to strengthen her business," so she asks to continue counting on them.

Presently the year-end holidays are approaching and with them an increase in her sales.  Because of this she needs more supplies to make rice cakes or doughs, vegetables, and three meats which are cooked after being wrapped in heliconia leaves, which is the most representative product of these celebrations and that which generates the most revenue.  This means that her new Kiva loan will once again be successful.

loans.use: to buy supplies in greater volume.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel vive junto a su grupo familiar su sobrina; ella se dedica a la  confección de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, elabora  en variedad camisas, faldas, vestidos, pantalones entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias; comercia desde el lugar que califico como muy bueno para la venta y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles, con producto de calidad y con un servicio excelente; Maribel es una mujer emprendedora y muy dedicada a su labor, siempre esta luchando por lo que desea y no piensa rendirse hasta alcanzar el éxito que se merece, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, agujas, tijeras etc. Maribel  tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Maribel lives with her niece and makes men’s, women’s, and children’s clothing.  She makes a variety of types of shirts, skirts, dresses, pants, and other things.  She’s been doing this for several years and it’s given her lots of experience that has allowed her to obtain a good profit.  She sells from the place that she has identified as being a good place to make sales and has many customers who prefer to buy from her because she always has what they need, at good prices, good quality, and with excellent service.

Maribel is an enterprising woman who is very dedicated to her work.  She is always working for what she wants and does not plan to quit until she is successful in what she deserves.  Demand has increased in the past months and she wants to take advantage of this by making a new investment.  She doesn’t have the working capital she needs, so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL.  This will allow her to buy fabric in quantity, thread, needles, scissors, etc.  Maribel has a good payment record and is very responsible.  She is certain that she can get out of debt and at the same time bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en: Lourdes is 61 years old, married, and thankful for her eight children.  Her family is her motivational guide, and she works hard to give them a better quality of life by doing something that brings additional income.  She has had a retail store based in their home for five years.  Since the daily net profit (500 PHP) is just enough to cover the cost of the family's daily meals, she is thankful to have another source of income.  She also has transport motorcycle, managed by her husband, for three years.  To improve her income in the store, Lourdes is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional groceries and to maintain her transport motorcycle (sprocket, gasoline, etc).  Lourdes says the loan will be very helpful in the success of her businesses.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries for her store and to maintain her transport motorcycle.

loans.name: Tolib

texts.ru: Толиб молодой человек,который торгует на рынке  продуктами питания и овощами.   Он женат имеет двоих дочек.  Его жена работает дворником  на рынке.    Толиб узнав от соседей о возможности кредитования, решил в кредит увеличить свой товарооборот и завезти оптом морковь и картошку,а также  зимние яблоки.   Толиб очень жизнерадостный мужчина, ему по бизнесу помогает его старшая дочь, которая замещает его в дни его отсутствия. Этот бизнес единственный, который дает доход, поэтому Толиб старается развивать его.  Он очень благодарен Арванд за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Tolib is a young man, who sells food items and vegetables at a market.  He's married and has two daughters. Tolib's wife works as a janitor at a market. 

Tolib learnt about an opportunity to obtain financing from his neighbors, and has decided to increase his turnover by purchasing through wholesale carrots and potatoes, and winter apples. Tolib is a very cheerful man, his elder daughter also helps him with the business, and replaces him during his absence. This business is the only source of income for his family, and that's why Tolib is trying to grow the business further. He is very grateful to Arvand for the help and support.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Merci

texts.en:
Merci is 28 years old and married with two children, William and Shiren.  William (7yrs) is attending 2nd grade and Shiren (4yrs) is attending kindergarten.  Two years ago, Merci bought a used minivan (called “bemo”) for public transportation.  In addition, she also sells petrol (gasoline) near the roadside.  These businesses help her to generate income for her family.  

At the moment, Merci cannot produce any income from the minivan as it is broken and in need of repair.  Therefore, Merci has requested a loan from TLM in the amount of IDR 3,500,000.
